description: '''Aleksandr Vladimirovich Revva''' ({{langx|ru|Александр Владимирович Ревва}}; {{langx|uk|Олександр Володимирович Ревва|Oleksandr Volodymyrovych Revva}}; born 10 September 1974), better known by his stage name '''Arthur Pirozhkov''' ({{langx|ru|Артур Владимирович Пирожков}}), is a Russian [[Stand-up comedy|stand-up comedian]], [[Television presenter|TV host]] and [[Voice acting|voice actor]] of [[Ukrainians|Ukrainian]] origin. A former [[KVN]] player, in 2006 Revva became a "resident" of the Russian [[Comedy Club (TV program)|Comedy Club]] show.
